tool_description: Calculates shipping costs for return packages across multiple carriers based on package dimensions, weight, and destination.
error_messages: Invalid postal codes: Both origin and destination postal codes must be valid.
Package exceeds size limits: Package dimensions exceed carrier maximum size restrictions.
Package exceeds weight limits: Package weight exceeds carrier maximum weight restrictions.
Invalid service level: Use one of [standard, expedited, overnight].
Declared value too high: Declared value exceeds maximum insurance coverage available.
usage: Provide package dimensions, weight, origin/destination, and service preferences to calculate shipping costs across carriers.

carrier_rates.description: List of carrier names and their rates

transit_times.description: Expected transit times for each carrier

recommended_carrier.description: Best balance of cost and speed
